name: kantele
description: A traditional Finnish plucked string instrument played over the lap. It has a distinctive bell-like sound.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your kantele.
You play a haunting, forlorn tune with your kantele.
You play a kantele rendition of Säkkijärven Polkka.

name: egg vibrator
description: A discreet adult toy perfect for winding down and relaxing. Not as powerful as a regular vibrator, but takes up less space.

name: vintage MRE
description: A 'Meal Ready to Eat' that was once fresh and just what any soldier needed. It comes with various food things and accessories. Nowadays, it's not looking as fresh, but the contents should still be nice! Disassemble to unpack.

name: vintage beef course
description: The now unsealed main course of a vintage MRE. It's not looking incredibly appetizing, but it should still be good eating.
